title: Everlast CEO President Congratulates 'What Do You Fight For?
description: Kim Brylow of Sarasota, FL was named the winner of Everlast's global 'What Do You Fight For?' philanthropic social movement and contest. Her brave story of twice fighting and overcoming triple negative breast cancer, earned Kim $5,000, which she donated t

asset.author: Everlast
asset.hookText: Kim Brylow of Sarasota, FL was named the winner of Everlast's global 'What Do You Fight For?' philanthropic social movement and contest. Her brave story of twice fighting and overcoming triple negative breast cancer, earned Kim $5,000, which she donated to the Triple Negative Breast Cancer Foundation, and a VIP trip for two to the Sergio Mora - Shane Mosley fight taking place at Staples Center in Los Angeles, CA. on September 18th.
